overall_summary: Development has shifted significantly toward established strategic roadmaps for public agent ecosystems and gaming integrations, while persistent token migration issues for Tangem wallet users require community management attention.
key_facts: PR #6301 was submitted by rejected-l to update the project license year to 2026.
The core development team proposed adding quest generation and NPC setup capabilities to the asset forge in hyperscape.
Tokens purchased after the migration snapshot currently lack a defined path for migration to ElizaOS.
DDR5 memory prices increased from $400 in September to $1200 as of January 2026.
Eliza Cloud initiated a token buyback program following reported positive performance.
A new unified useElizaChat hook was introduced to standardize client interactions across HTTP, SSE, and WebSocket transports.
User borisudovicic submitted Issue #6315 proposing a reduction in new user free credits from $5 to $1.
Shaw shared progress on the Jeju backend, including an OAuth3 testnet site routing to IPFS assets.
open_questions: What will happen to Ai16z tokens bought after snapshot? Can they be migrated?
When is the deadline for manually swapping ai16z tokens to elizaos tokens?
Could eliza be used to help manage and schedule farcaster posts?
Anyone have an idea if it'd be possible to import an entire codebase as an agent to eliza?
Can I use plugins that were not added to the cloud from the docs?

twitter_news_highlights.claim: Eliza Cloud is performing well and has initiated a buyback program using revenue as a deflationary mechanism.
Shaw discussed the lore of ElizaOS and its influence on AI success stories across Solana, Base, and BSC in a recent interview.

new_issues_prs.title: unified hooks with multi-transport support (HTTP/SSE/WebSocket)
new_issues_prs.author: standujar
new_issues_prs.significance: Simplifies client-side development by providing a single interface for all communication protocols.

new_issues_prs.title: Add an agent discovery module to the landing page and dashboard
new_issues_prs.author: borisudovicic
new_issues_prs.significance: Core component of the new strategic focus on a public agent ecosystem.

new_issues_prs.title: v2.0.0 working branch
new_issues_prs.author: lalalune
new_issues_prs.significance: Massive structural overhaul focusing on Rust and TypeScript runtimes while removing non-essentials.

overall_focus.claim: Development is focused on platform stability, extensive documentation expansion for the REST API and CLI, and a UI cleanup to resolve a backlog of agent management issues.
Strategic planning for January 2026 centers on defining the next generation of public agents, including forking, knowledge transfer, and discovery modules.

discord_updates.summary: Strategic shift towards building quality gaming experiences within hyperscape, specifically Zelda-like and RuneScape-inspired agent-integrated games.
Proposal for 'Eliza DWS Transform', an agent-based infrastructure tool to migrate SMB hosting from AWS to the Jeju network to reduce costs.
Community sentiment is high for the new year, though technical friction persists regarding token migration and wallet compatibility.

user_feedback.feedback_summary: Users are reporting critical compatibility issues with Tangem wallets during AI16Z to ElizaOS migration, specifically zero balance errors.
Requests for improved chat summary quality and more meaningful summaries for agents to help better manage conversation context.

strategic_insights.insight: The move to integrate agents into Zelda-style metaverses suggests a strategy to move beyond simple chatbots toward persistent, interactive virtual entities as a primary utility.
implications_or_questions: Should development resources be further diverted from core API to gaming integrations?
How will NPC agents be monetized within these environments?

strategic_insights.insight: The development of Jeju's self-owned infrastructure and the proposed AWS migration agent indicate a long-term goal of total service decentralization to avoid high hosting and API costs.
implications_or_questions: Does the triple price increase in hardware impact the timeline for self-owned physical racks?

market_analysis.observation: Significant chip market volatility: DDR5 memory prices have tripled in four months.
market_analysis.relevance: Directly impacts the cost-efficiency of deploying decentralized AI infrastructure for the Jeju network.
